mapper.select: select activityid, teacherid, schoolid, startDate, endDate, attend, created_time, updated_time, updated_person from activity_real_teacher where activityid = #{activityid}
mapper.insert: insert into activity_real_teacher(schoolid, startDate, endDate, attend, created_time, updated_time, updated_person) values (#{schoolid}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{attend}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{updatedPerson})

insert into activity_real_teacher(activityid, teacherid, schoolid, startDate, endDate, attend, updated_person) values
(#{entity.activityid}, #{entity.teacherid}, #{entity.schoolid}, #{entity.startdate}, #{entity.enddate}, #{entity.attend}, #{entity.updatedPerson})

insert into activity_real_teacher(schoolid, startDate, endDate, attend, created_time, updated_time, updated_person) values
(#{entity.schoolid}, #{entity.startdate}, #{entity.enddate}, #{entity.attend}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.updatedPerson})
on duplicate key update schoolid = values(schoolid), startDate = values(startDate), endDate = values(endDate), attend = values(attend), created_time = values(created_time), updated_time = values(updated_time), updated_person = values(updated_person)
mapper.update:
update activity_real_teacher
schoolid = #{schoolid},
startDate = #{startdate},
endDate = #{enddate},
attend = #{attend},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
updated_person = #{updatedPerson},
where activityid = #{activityid}
